record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 3564
record.narrative:
MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 3564 -- (Senate - October 24, 2007)

[Page: S13390]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.R. 3564 has been received from the House and is at the desk. I ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title for the first time.
The assistant legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 3564) to amend title 5, United States Code, to authorize appropriations for the Administrative Conference of the United States through fiscal year 2011, and for other purposes.

speaking.paragraph: I ask for its second reading and object to my own request.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be read a second time on the next legislative day.
